meanings.definition: A plant of the mint family with aromatic leaves and spikes of small pink or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The peppermint in the garden smelled so fresh and minty.
meanings.sent2: I love the taste of peppermint in my tea.
meanings.sent3: The peppermint plant whispered to the other herbs, 'I'm the coolest in the garden.'
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a field of peppermint, refreshing and delightful.
meanings.sent5: The peppermint leaves danced in the breeze, spreading their sweet scent.

meanings.definition: A candy or lozenge flavored with peppermint oil.
meanings.sent1: She offered me a peppermint after dinner as a treat.
meanings.sent2: I always keep peppermint in my bag for a quick breath freshener.
meanings.sent3: The peppermint candy winked at me from the jar, tempting me to grab it.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a peppermint lozenge, soothing and comforting.
meanings.sent5: The peppermint lozenge melted on my tongue, releasing its minty flavor.
